string-array.name: dessert_description
string-array.item: Chicken is grilled in beautiful spice vegetables
Fish is steamed and served with lemon and tarter sauce
Just a boring looking burger but one bite sends you to heaven on a one-way express trip
Steak is grilled medium-rare and enjoyed with very well fried asparagus and spiced well with pepper and barbecue sauce
Chicken is grilled in beautiful spice vegetables
Fish is steamed and served with lemon and tarter sauce
